text: Shrdju (, ), one of the most ancient villages in Goghtn Region of Armenia, currently included into Ordubad region of Nakhichevan autonomy of Azerbaijan. In the second half of 19th century the last Armenian population (60-80 families) left the village. The empty village has ruins of a church and other constructions. Category:Populated places in Ordubad District
title: Shrdju
